titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning Sanchoniathon's Phœnician history by Henry Dodwell ...
titleStmt.author: Dodwell, Henry, 1641-1711.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Clark for B. Tooke ...,

notesStmt.note: This history, by Philo of Byblus, professed to be based upon the work of Sanchuniathon, a contemporary of Queen Semiramis. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
